title: Video-Based Reflective Practice Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory and lesson plan development experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, utilizing simulation/VR tools for practical training. Pre-service language teachers analyze peer teaching videos and exchange feedback.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze peer teachers' lesson videos and annotate at least one specific strength and one improvement point using annotation tools
Learners can revise and redesign at least three of their instructional practice strategies based on feedback received from peers
Learners can recognize at least two issues arising in their lesson implementation through video-based reflection and develop improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
